item.title: DAL
item.description: score:-87 Chances: Delta Air Lines, Inc. is witnessing a steady recovery in the global tourism market, which is projected to reach $16.9 trillion. The company’s revenue has shown a 15% increase from FY 2022, reaching US$58.0 billion. Delta Air Lines has received approval for patented technology, reflecting its commitment to innovation and expansion in the payment space.
